1.definition: the documentary account of something [confidential medical]

sub_terms.a: an official document that records the acts of a public body or officer
sub_terms.b: an official copy of a document deposited with a designated officer
sub_terms.c: the official set of papers used and generated in a proceeding [the appeals court reviewed the trial ]
sub_terms.d: documented evidence or history of one or more arrests or convictions see also,

2.definition: something (as a disc or tape) on which images, sound, or data has been recorded

3.definition: to cause (as sound, images, or data) to be registered on something in reproducible form [ a telephone conversation]to record something[re-k…ôrd] n
